Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Both A - T homozygotes and heterozygotes showed significantly increased levels of radiation - induced chromatid damage relative to that of normal controls .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Normal controls (individuals without chromatid damage induced by radiation) |
| A - T homozygotes (individuals who have two copies of the A - T gene)
| A - T heterozygotes (individuals who have one copy of the A - T gene)
| Radiation-induced chromatid damage (damage to chromatids caused by radiation) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Radiation-induced chromatid damage (damage to chromatids caused by radiation) |
| A - T homozygotes (individuals who have two copies of the A - T gene)
| A - T heterozygotes (individuals who have one copy of the A - T gene) |
